---

## About Textastic

Textastic represents the versatile code editor solution for developers and content creators, offering powerful text editing capabilities with comprehensive language support across both macOS and Windows platforms. This sophisticated code editor combines the simplicity of a text editor with the advanced features needed for professional development work, providing a clean and efficient environment for coding, scripting, and document creation. The intuitive interface combined with robust editing tools makes Textastic the preferred choice for web developers, system administrators, writers, and anyone working with code or structured text files who values speed and efficiency in their editing workflow.

The application's extensive feature set includes advanced search and replace with regular expression support, multiple cursor editing for simultaneous changes across different parts of a document, and integrated file transfer capabilities that allow direct editing of remote files without manual downloading and uploading. Whether you're developing web applications, writing scripts, editing configuration files, creating documentation, or working with data files, Textastic delivers responsive performance with the precision needed for professional text editing. The cross-platform compatibility ensures consistent editing experiences whether working on macOS systems or Windows computers, while the optimized rendering engine provides smooth scrolling and instant syntax highlighting even with large files.

---

## ‚ú® Textastic Advantages

üåê **Remote File Editing** - Direct editing of files on servers via FTP, SFTP, and WebDAV

üìö **Extensive Language Support** - Syntax highlighting for 80+ programming and markup languages

üîß **Customizable Interface** - Themes, font preferences, and keyboard shortcut customization

‚ö° **Fast Performance** - Optimized for large files with instant loading and smooth editing

üì± **Sync & Integration** - Document synchronization and external editor integration

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è System Requirements

**For macOS Systems:**
- macOS Monterey 12.0 or later
- 4GB RAM minimum (8GB recommended for large files and multiple documents)
- 200MB available storage space for application and working files
- Compatible with Intel and Apple Silicon processors
- Network connectivity for remote file transfer features

**For Windows Platforms:**
- Windows 10 or later (64-bit architecture recommended)
- 4GB RAM (8GB recommended for optimal performance)
- 200MB available storage space
- .NET Framework 4.8 or later
- Administrative privileges for certain file operations

---

## üìà Editing Applications

**Web Development** - HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP editing with live preview capabilities

**Script Writing** - Python, Ruby, Bash, and other scripting language development

**Configuration Management** - Editing system configuration files and application settings

**Documentation Writing** - Markdown, reStructuredText, and technical documentation

**Data File Editing** - JSON, XML, CSV, and other structured data file manipulation
